    <!-- AOT -->
    <PublishAot>true</PublishAot>
    <!-- <Nullable>enable</Nullable> -->

        <!-- AOT Reduce Size options - Remove it not working-->
    <InvariantGlobalization>true</InvariantGlobalization> <!-- Optional: smaller binary -->
    <IlcOptimizationPreference>Size</IlcOptimizationPreference> <!-- Optional - Optimze for Size or Speed -->
    <StripSymbols>true</StripSymbols>  <!-- Optional: smaller binary -->
